headline: Why Reddit (RDDT) Shares Are Plunging Today
summary: Shares of online community and discussion platform Reddit (NYSE:RDDT) fell 9.9% in the afternoon session after reports surfaced that OpenAI's ChatGPT was not using the social media platform's data as much as investors had anticipated. Concerns gained traction on the social media platform X, where multiple posts cited data from PromptWatch and Similarweb, suggesting ChatGPT was not heavily drawing on Reddit's content. The market reacted to fears that the company's data licensing partnership was l
